summary: * Work around a bizarre bug that causes nvidia-settings to be able to   find libXrandr when invoked as "nvidia-settings", but not when   invoked by absolute path   (e.g. "/var/run/current-system/sw/bin/nvidia-settings").  Adding it   to libGL's RUNPATH fixes this.  Strangely, libGL doesn't even   contain a reference to libXrandr.
